title: Championship Zed
body: Hey Riot, can we get an update on why CS Zed was removed from this patch?

replies.body: the chamionship skins always come out at worlds. they were earlyer finished than last year is what i am expecting so they took him back and will bring him out at worlds which is still like 1month to go
They will prob release another patch by the time worlds ends up through and release it then... or they are tweaking the skin like they did with the SKT skins.
